channel.title: KunRuch Creations apps feed
channel.description: A RSS feed of KunRuch Creations apps

item.title: Spooky Planet
item.description: Help our friendly neighbourhood alien escape the spooky planet and return to his family in this addicting fun filled game.

item.title: SMS Art
item.description: Must have collection of ASCII arts! Send cute Birthday, Christmas ★, New Year Greetings, Love messages ♥, exclamations and many more to choose from.

item.title: MyTextTwister
item.description: Add lots of fun to SMS, email, Facebook and Twitter. Create amazing text effects and decorate it with cool ASCII arts and top it up with built-in 1200+ emoticons.

item.title: Emojicons
item.description: The easiest to use Metro style emojicons composer with the largest (1200+) collection of emoji! Comes with a see-through mode to help you in texting while walking.

item.title: MyTileMaker
item.description: A one stop solution for creating your own custom start screen tiles on Windows Phone. Pin Memo, Reminders, Shpping Lists, TODOs and Images to your start screen.
